name: Super Lootbox!
description:
One part "I Can't Believe It's Not Gambling" and one part Edmund McMillen and Tyler Glaiel's "A.V.G.M." Open lootboxes and watch them change! Can you reach the fabled golden lootbox? Don't worry about his face, he loves being opened. I made this in a day specifically because I thought it was funny. Enjoy!

--ATTRIBUTION--
